1: In this study, we assessed the association between dementia and VH with aSyn and AD-type pathology (amyloid peptide b ( Ab) and tau) using an experimental design that enabled us to isolate clinical features of interest and study their anatomical and pathological basis
2: We identified 9 PD cases without dementia and without VH
12 PD cases with moderate to severe dementia and with VH
4 PD cases with moderate to severe dementia alone with- out VH
PD cases with moderate to severe VH alone without dementia
5: a strong association was found between aSyn burden in the amygda- loid complex
d VH in PD cases with concomi- tant dementia
